testCase.name: earliest by offset with an array added
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID BIGINT KEY, F0 INT, F1 BIGINT, F2 DOUBLE, F3 BOOLEAN, F4 STRING, F5 TIMESTAMP, F6 TIME, F7 DATE, F8 BYTES, F9 ARRAY<INT>) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');

CREATE TABLE OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F0) AS L0, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F1) AS L1, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F2) AS L2, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F3) AS L3, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F4) AS L4, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F5) AS L5, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F6) AS L6, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F7) AS L7, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F8) AS L8, EARLIEST_BY_OFFSET(F9) AS L9 FROM INPUT GROUP BY ID;
